overview.en: CC is the token that empowers the CCSwap ecosystem. CCSwap is a decentralized AMM compound trading protocol with built-in loaning and trade mining support. In addition to the conventional swap function, CCSwap also integrates features including on-chain perpetual contract trading, on-chain options trading, etc.
overview.zh: CC是为CCSwap生态系统赋能的代币。CCSwap是一个自带借贷和交易挖矿功能的去中心化AMM复合交易协议，除了现货交易以外，CCSwap还提供基于AMM的永续合约交易以及期权交易功能。
